question: You recently went to concert and thought one of the singers was very good. You want to tell him how you feel. Write a letter to the singerSay how you feel about his performance Give detail of your musical activities Explain how you would like him to help you with your musical activities.
text: I am writing this letter with regards to express my feeling upon your performance at a concert held 2 days ago.

Your vocal and lead guitar skills are stunning. I think the last song you sang and played at the concert was not easy for others. You are the one who made my heart melted at that night. My whole family members are your fans as well.

I attended so many vocal classes and guitar as well but not much improving my guitar skill so far. I always practice using your songs because they are my favourite. Especially, my difficulty is I cannot play a song when I sing like you.

I beg you to teach and give me some tips if you can. I want to be a professional singer as well as a guitarist like you. You are my musical mentor. I would be very much appreciated it if you would reply my this letter.
